name: Kleptobot
description:
(Entry for Global Game Jam 2021) You are a robot. You awake in an unknown place. Without arms. Someone stole them. Can you find them? Use WASD for moving, and mouse pointer to face your enemies. Mouse button for punching/shooting (left and right, respectively).

------ Credits ------

Developers Juanjo Ramos Raformatico - http://youtube.com/c/raformatico

Audio Ignacio Segura - Man from Space SoundCloud http://soundcloud.com/manfromspace

Design Fran Arroyo - http://franarroyo.itch.io Chumbo comunicación  - http://somoschumbo.com
